name: Cashio
introduce: Cashio is a decentralized money application that allows users to print a USD pegged stable coin - $CASH - by depositing stable pair LP tokens of corresponding value as collateral. $CASH can be leveraged in DeFi for competetive yields from stable coins, used as a decentralized store of value/medium of exchange, or swapped with any other traditional stable coin on the market at a 1:1 ratio.
